title: Was That A Message?
description:
Israel Gutierrez, Sarah Spain and Bill Barnwell debate the significance of Tom Brady not mentioning the Patriots, Bob Kraft or Bill Belichick in his retirement post and their reaction to the speculated name of the Washington Commanders.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Was Tom Brady Sending A Message By Leaving New England Out Of His Post?
